channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk AssetCentre
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk AssetCentre

item.title: CVE-2021-27464|2024-08-03T20:48:17.235Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: The ArchiveService.rem service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier exposes functions lacking proper authentication. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2021-27472|2024-08-03T20:48:17.219Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the RunSearch function of SearchService service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier, which may allow for the execution of remote unauthenticated arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2021-27474|2024-08-03T20:48:17.316Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier does not properly restrict all functions relating to IIS remoting services. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to modify sensitive data in FactoryTalk AssetCentre.

item.title: CVE-2021-27476|2024-08-03T20:48:17.254Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the SaveConfigFile function of the RACompare Service, which may allow for OS command injection. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2021-27462|2024-08-03T20:48:17.184Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: A deserialization vulnerability exists in how the AosService.rem service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier verifies serialized data. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands in FactoryTalk AssetCentre.

item.title: CVE-2021-27466|2024-08-03T20:48:17.210Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: A deserialization vulnerability exists in how the ArchiveService.rem service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier verifies serialized data. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands in FactoryTalk AssetCentre.

item.title: CVE-2021-27470|2024-08-03T20:48:17.254Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: A deserialization vulnerability exists in how the LogService.rem service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier verifies serialized data. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands in FactoryTalk AssetCentre.

item.title: CVE-2021-27468|2024-08-03T20:48:17.351Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: The AosService.rem service in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier exposes functions lacking proper authentication. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2021-27460|2024-08-03T20:48:17.147Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20assetcentre
item.description: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk AssetCentre v10.00 and earlier components contain .NET remoting endpoints that deserialize untrusted data without sufficiently verifying that the resulting data will be valid. This vulnerability may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to gain full access to the FactoryTalk AssetCentre main server and all agent machines.
